name: Shipping
description:
A Story of Divine Intervention

Shipping is a short visual novel about matchmaking.

After failing to listen to your mother, Venus, on the importance of matchmaking and compatibility, you accidentally mismatch coworkers at a post office!

Play as Cupid in his efforts to fix mixed up feelings and misdelivered confessions. Talk to coworkers and sort through mailboxes to find the best match!

(Approx. 20+ minutes)

Enjoy!
